Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's Undersea Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Duke O'Dowd, the cab driver who becomes the Human Meteor, and follows his initial adventure involving a suspicious sedan, a yacht, and the discovery of a Japanese submarine plot.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Human Meteor and Duke O'Dowd in his taxi driver persona. It sets up Duke's encounter with playboys and his journey to the waterfront.

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Duke's transformation into Human Meteor after noticing a suspicious sedan and his subsequent confrontation with its occupants.

narrative_arcs.title: Suspicious Sedan and the Human Meteor's Emergence

sub_scenes.title: Stowaway Plan and Yacht Intrigue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Duke's plan to stowaway on the yacht, Toby's successful infiltration, and Pete's suspicious discovery and fall overboard.

narrative_arcs.title: Pete's Yacht Duty and Suspicious Chart
Duke's Observation and Toby's Confirmed Action

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Investigation and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Human Meteor's underwater actions, the discovery of the Japanese submarine, and the confrontation with divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Rush and Pete's Rescue
Discovery of the Sunken Japanese Submarine
Inside the Submarine: Torpedo Loading Operation
Surface Attack and Plea for Help
Depth Map Discovery in Peter's Cabin
Evening Drive Home and Future Growth
Bedtime and Anticipation of New Adventures

Major_Arcs.title: The Liberty Lads and the Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline featuring the Liberty Lads and their confrontation with Nazis, leading to an ambulance incident and the discovery of a Nazi spy ring at the Transcontinental Bus Company.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazis and Ambulance Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Liberty Lads in a fight against Nazis and then transitions to a suburban setting with the arrival of an ambulance observed by Skip and Chuck.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Person at the House

sub_scenes.title: The Lost Wallet and the Garage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Skip and Chuck as they find a wallet dropped by the ambulance interne, decide to return it, and arrive near the Transcontinental Bus Company garage.

narrative_arcs.title: Approaching the Garage to Return the Wallet

sub_scenes.title: Ambush and Interrogation at the Garage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the boys' arrival at the garage, their ambush by Mr. Horst, and the subsequent interrogation and threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning and Suspicion about the Wallet
Wallet Examination and Discovery of Address

sub_scenes.title: Major Bronson's Intervention and Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Major Bronson's unexpected arrival and intervention, his plan to poison the boys, and his betrayal of Horst, leading to the boys' escape.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Secret Office Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Skip and Chuck as they decide to split up to seek help, with Chuck fleeing and Skip discovering a secret office revealing sabotage plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks and Final Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves the warning at the Marine Barracks, the forceful arrival of marines, and the final confrontation with the Nazi spy ring, leading to their defeat and Major Bronson's rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Nazi Rats' Taunt and Marine Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Henry vs. El Tigre
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows The Champ and Henry in South America as they get entangled in intrigue, accused of kidnapping, and ultimately rescue President Rosita's daughter from El Tigre, uncovering an Axis submarine plot.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces The Champ and Henry and establishes the South American setting where they are about to face a new mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission
Discovery in South American Town and Impending Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Army Interrogation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the aggressive interrogation of Champ and Henry by army officers and reveals the reason behind it - the kidnapping of President Rosita's daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Ride and Rosita's Mother's Plea
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Champ and Henry being forced into a car and taken to Rosita's mother, who pleads for their help in rescuing her daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Car Ride and Arrival at Rosita's Mother's House
Plea for Help and Intelligence from Rosita's Mother

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Confrontation with El Tigre
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Champ and Henry infiltrating El Tigre's hideout using a diversion, leading to a direct confrontation with El Tigre himself.

narrative_arcs.title: Sneaking into El Tigre's Hideout and Planning a Diversion
Money Diversion and El Tigre's Distraction

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Personal Vendetta
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a separate interrogation scene, unrelated to Champ and Henry directly, involving a small man in a garbage can and reveals a personal vendetta against Axis agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Threat of Force for Rosita's Location

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mission and Confrontation with Axis Agents
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the rescue mission to save Rosita, starting with a misunderstanding and quickly transitioning into action as they learn Rosita's location and mobilize for rescue.

sub_scenes.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a new storyline featuring Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, fighting against native men and involved in a mission against an international spy ring, seemingly separate from the Rosita rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Brawl with Devil Dog Dolan
Reporting a Grave Matter to Captain Lawton
Arrival, Jungle Infiltration, and Hidden Threat
Capture and Initial Search of the Native Man
Preparation for Torture and Forced Compliance
Cooperation and Information Exchange with Foreign Agent
Sam's Sacrifice and Dolan's Vengeful Resolve
Shore Leave Reward and Service Spanking

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them to uncover a conspiracy involving Farnacci and a desperate need for a blood transfusion for a sick child.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and News Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and sets up their new assignment: investigating the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Dan and Diane as they investigate at the police station and then at the hospital, uncovering information about Guy Reilly and his sick daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly's Illness

sub_scenes.title: Connecting the Dots and Planning Next Steps
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Dan and Diane deciding to inform Elijah, receiving crucial information from a news broadcast, and planning to find Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Inform Elijah and Phone Call

sub_scenes.title: Search for Reilly and the Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dan and Diane's search for Tom Reilly, their visit to Mrs. Murphy, and the ambush they face as they leave her house.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Revelation and the Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Chase, and Community Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dan and Diane's escape from the ambush, the ensuing chase, and the intervention of the Irish neighborhood, leading to the capture of the crooks.

narrative_arcs.title: Diane's Cab Chase and Irish Blockade
Irish Neighborhood Intervention and Police Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Wait, Blood Transfusion, and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Twinkle Twins storyline by showing the aftermath at the hospital, the desperate need for blood, community support, and ultimately, Lassie's recovery and a celebratory ending.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hospital and Anxious Wait
Urgent Need for Blood Transfusion and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call and Community Response for Blood Donors
Demand for Justice and Police Involvement
Police Raid and Confrontation at the Poolroom
